channel.title: Errors!
channel.description:
Okay, So for some odd reason java wont let me run my server unless its the newest version? Also, If anyone else tries to login to my server without the newest java downloaded, it just tells them this exactly
A Java exception error has occured
Also, It tells me this when I run my client, [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/jhphyt.png[/img] someone help me please :/

item.title: Errors!
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

I fixed it last night, the first guy was correct… Sort of… The Signlink class was running GUI Java 8 while all other files were running with Java 7, so I just replaced my signlink class, with an older oneee. Thanks though guys :

Read full topic

item.title: Errors!
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Looks like you have to recompile it. If you don’t have the source - then best find the owner of it

Read full topic

item.title: Errors!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

lol space:

Okay, So for some odd reason java wont let me run my server unless its the newest version? Also, If anyone else tries to login to my server without the newest java downloaded, it just tells them this exactly [quote]A Java exception error has occured

Also, It tells me this when I run my client,

someone help me please :/[/quote]

What that’s saying is that the GUI classes were built with java 8, but you’re trying to run it in java 7 or 6.

Read full topic
